directions: Combine coconut milk, brown sugar, 2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons margarine, and vanilla extract in a saucepan. Heat on low, watching carefully and stirring occasionally, until mixture registers 236 degrees F (113 degrees C) on an instant-read or candy thermometer. Remove from heat. Mix in any grease that separated from the mixture, or carefully pour it off.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegan margarine (such as Earth Balance®)
2 teaspoons vegan margarine (such as Earth Balance®)
title: Vegan Coconut Caramel
